name: 戦闘不能

message1: は毒にかかった！
name: 毒

name: 暗闇

name: 沈黙

message1: は眠った！

note:
States 11 through 40 have been added to handle objectives.
CE 176 applies states and selectes correct message.
 * Name = what appears in save/load scene file previews.
 * Message1 = what appears as DText.
 * Message2,3,4 = alternate DText for some objectives.

For example:
message1 = more than 1 Killing Stones pieces
message2 = 1 Killing Stone piece

message1: 茶柱塾へ向かうも！
name: 茶柱塾へ向かうも！
note:
<English Translation>
[name]:Visit Chabashira!
[message1]:Go to Mr. Chabashira!
</English Translation>

<Español Translation>
[name]:¡Ir a la escuela!
[message1]:¡Ve a la escuela de Chabashira! 
</Español Translation>

<Português Translation>
[name]:Ir à escola!
[message1]:Vou pra escola do Chabashira! 
</Português Translation>

<한국어 Translation>
[name]:킨토키 선생님이 있는 서당으로 가자 다모!
[message1]: 킨토키 선생님이 있는 서당으로 가자 다모! 
</한국어 Translation>

<简体中文 Translation>
[name]:前往茶柱塾吧莫！
[message1]:前往茶柱塾吧莫！
</简体中文 Translation>

message1: 参道を散策するも！
name: 参道を散策するも！
note:
<English Translation>
[name]:Stroll the sando!
[message1]:Take a stroll down the sando!
</English Translation>

<Español Translation>
[name]:¡Recorrer el sandō!
[message1]:¡Da una vuelta por el sandō y las tiendas! 
</Español Translation>

<Português Translation>
[name]:Caminhar pelo sandō!
[message1]:Estou dando uma volta pelo sandō e pelas lojas! 
</Português Translation>

<한국어 Translation>
[name]:참배길로 가자 다모!
[message1]: 참배길로 가자 다모! 
</한국어 Translation>

<简体中文 Translation>
[name]:在参道闲逛吧莫！
[message1]:在参道闲逛吧莫！
</简体中文 Translation>

message1: 憑依峠に行くも！
name: 憑依峠に行くも！
note:
<English Translation>
[name]:Go to Hyoi Pass!
[message1]:Go to Hyoi Pass!
</English Translation>

<Español Translation>
[name]:¡Ir al Paso de Hyōi!
[message1]:¡Ve al Paso de Hyōi! 
</Español Translation>

<Português Translation>
[name]:Ir ao Passo de Hyōi!
[message1]:Vou pro Passo de Hyōi! 
</Português Translation>

<한국어 Translation>
[name]:등산로로 가자 다모!
[message1]: 등산로로 가자 다모! 
</한국어 Translation>

<简体中文 Translation>
[name]:前往凭依关吧莫！
[message1]:前往凭依关吧莫！
</简体中文 Translation>

message1: 一度茶柱塾に戻るも！
name: 一度茶柱塾に戻るも！
note:
<English Translation>
[name]:Return to Chabashira!
[message1]:Go back to Mr. Chabashira!
</English Translation>

<Español Translation>
[name]:¡Volver a Chabashira!
[message1]:¡Vuelve a Chabashira una vez más! 
</Español Translation>

<Português Translation>
[name]:Voltar ao Chabashira!
[message1]:Vou voltar pro Chabashira mais uma vez! 
</Português Translation>

<한국어 Translation>
[name]:한번 서당으로 돌아가 보자 다모!
[message1]: 한번 서당으로 돌아가 보자 다모! 
</한국어 Translation>

<简体中文 Translation>
[name]:先回茶柱塾吧莫！
[message1]:先回茶柱塾吧莫！
</简体中文 Translation>

message1: エンジェルに都の案内をするも！
name: エンジェルに都の案内をするも！
note:
<English Translation>
[name]:Guide Angel around!
[message1]:Give a city tour to Angel!
</English Translation>

<Español Translation>
[name]:¡Guiar a Ángel!
[message1]:¡Guía a Ángel por la ciudad! 
</Español Translation>

<Português Translation>
[name]:Guiar Anjo!
[message1]:Estou guiando Anjo pela cidade! 
</Português Translation>

<한국어 Translation>

[message1]: 엔젤에게 이 마을을 안내하자 다모! 
</한국어 Translation>

[message1]:带恩洁尔参观城市吧莫！
</简体中文 Translation>

[message1]:Talk to Mr. Chabashira at the Chabashira Juku!

[message1]:Vamos nos encontrar com o Chabashira na escola dele!

message1: ツツジソウを摘んでてまりの所へ向かうも！

message1: 幻影の花園の先まで金魚の朱姫を探すも！

[message1]:Estou procurando a peixinha-dourada Akahime debaixo do jardim do Passo de Genei! 
</Português Translation>

[message1]:¡Encuentra un recipiente para llevar a Akahime!
